classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Service for interacting with GitHub issues via the GraphQL API.
 *
 * This service provides a high-level abstraction for managing GitHub issues.
 * Capabilities include:
 * - Listing issues with advanced filtering (state, labels, assignees)
 * - Creating, updating, and assigning issues
 * - Managing issue labels
 * - Handling issue relationships (parent-child, blocked-by) via custom GraphQL mutations
 * - Commenting on issues
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.server.github-workflow.services.IssueService
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.summary:
Service for interacting with GitHub issues via the GraphQL API.

This service provides a high-level abstraction for managing GitHub issues.
Capabilities include:
- Listing issues with advanced filtering (state, labels, assignees)
- Creating, updating, and assigning issues
- Managing issue labels
- Handling issue relationships (parent-child, blocked-by) via custom GraphQL mutations
- Commenting on issues
classData.name: IssueService

classData.comment:
/**
     * Adds labels to an issue or pull request.
     * @param {number}   issueNumber The number of the issue or PR.
     * @param {string[]} labels      An array of labels to add.
     * @returns {Promise<object>} A promise that resolves to a success message.
     */
classData.description: Adds labels to an issue or pull request.

params.description: The number of the issue or PR.
params.name: issueNumber

returns.description: A promise that resolves to a success message.

classData.name: addLabels

classData.comment:
/**
     * Assigns one or more users to a GitHub issue, or clears all assignees.
     * This method first verifies that the user has the required permissions (`WRITE`, `MAINTAIN`, or `ADMIN`)
     * before attempting to modify the issue.
     * - To add assignees, provide an array of GitHub logins.
     * - To clear all assignees, provide an empty array.
     * @param {object}   options              The options object
     * @param {number}   options.issue_number The number of the issue to modify.
     * @param {string[]} options.assignees    An array of GitHub user logins to assign, or an empty array to clear all assignees.
     * @returns {Promise<object>}
     */
classData.description:
Assigns one or more users to a GitHub issue, or clears all assignees. This method first verifies that the user has the required permissions (WRITE, MAINTAIN, or ADMIN) before attempting to modify the issue.

  • To add assignees, provide an array of GitHub logins.
  • To clear all assignees, provide an empty array.

params.description: The number of the issue to modify.
params.name: options.issue_number

params.description: An array of GitHub user logins to assign, or an empty array to clear all assignees.
params.name: options.assignees

classData.name: assignIssue

classData.comment:
/**
     * Creates a comment on a specific issue or pull request.
     * @param {object} options                The options object
     * @param {number} [options.issue_number] The number of the issue.
     * @param {number} [options.pr_number]    The number of the pull request.
     * @param {string} options.body           The raw content of the comment.
     * @param {string} options.agent          The identity of the calling agent.
     * @returns {Promise<object>} A promise that resolves to a success message.
     */
classData.description: Creates a comment on a specific issue or pull request.

returns.description: A promise that resolves to a success message.

classData.name: createComment

classData.comment:
/**
     * Creates a new GitHub issue using the `gh` CLI.
     * @param {object}   options                The options for creating the issue.
     * @param {string}   options.title          The title of the issue.
     * @param {string}   [options.body='']      The Markdown body of the issue.
     * @param {string[]} [options.labels=[]]    An array of labels to add to the issue.
     * @param {string[]} [options.assignees=[]] An array of user logins to assign.
     * @returns {Promise<object>} A promise that resolves to the new issue's data or a structured error.
     */
classData.description: Creates a new GitHub issue using the gh CLI.

params.description: An array of labels to add to the issue.
params.name: options.labels

params.description: An array of user logins to assign.
params.name: options.assignees

returns.description: A promise that resolves to the new issue's data or a structured error.

classData.name: createIssue

classData.comment:

classData.description: Extracts the agent type from the agent string for icon selection.

returns.description: The agent type key for AGENT_ICONS lookup

classData.name: getAgentType

classData.comment:
/**
     * Consolidates assignee management into a single method.
     * @param {object}   options              The options object
     * @param {number}   options.issue_number The number of the issue to modify.
     * @param {string[]} options.assignees    An array of GitHub user logins to assign/unassign.
     * @param {string}   options.action       The action to perform: 'add' or 'remove'.
     * @returns {Promise<object>}
     */
classData.description: Consolidates assignee management into a single method.

params.description: The number of the issue to modify.
params.name: options.issue_number

params.description: An array of GitHub user logins to assign/unassign.
params.name: options.assignees

classData.comment:
/**
     * Consolidates comment management into a single method.
     * @param {object} options                The options object
     * @param {number} [options.issue_number] The number of the issue (required for create).
     * @param {number} [options.pr_number]    The number of the pull request (required for create if issue_number omitted).
     * @param {string} [options.comment_id]   The global node ID of the comment (required for update).
     * @param {string} options.body           The content of the comment.
     * @param {string} [options.agent]        The identity of the calling agent (required for create).
     * @param {string} options.action         The action to perform: 'create' or 'update'.
     * @returns {Promise<object>}
     */
classData.description: Consolidates comment management into a single method.

params.description: The number of the issue (required for create).
params.name: options.issue_number

params.description: The number of the pull request (required for create if issue_number omitted).
params.name: options.pr_number

params.description: The global node ID of the comment (required for update).
params.name: options.comment_id

params.description: The identity of the calling agent (required for create).
params.name: options.agent

classData.comment:
/**
     * Lists issues from the repository using the GraphQL API.
     * Supports basic pagination and state filtering. Label and assignee
     * filters are applied client-side to keep the GraphQL query simple and
     * compatible with the existing sync query.
     * @param {object}          options                The options object
     * @param {number}          [options.limit=30]     The maximum number of issues to return
     * @param {string}          [options.state='open'] Filter issues by state (open, closed)
     * @param {string[]|string} [options.labels]       Comma separated list of labels to filter by
     * @param {string}          [options.assignee]     Filter issues by a single assignee login
     * @param {string}          [options.cursor]       Cursor for pagination
     * @returns {Promise<object>}
     */
classData.description: Lists issues from the repository using the GraphQL API. Supports basic pagination and state filtering. Label and assignee filters are applied client-side to keep the GraphQL query simple and compatible with the existing sync query.

params.description: The maximum number of issues to return
params.name: options.limit

params.description: Comma separated list of labels to filter by
params.name: options.labels

params.description: Filter issues by a single assignee login
params.name: options.assignee

classData.name: listIssues

classData.comment:
/**
     * Removes labels from an issue or pull request.
     * @param {number}   issueNumber The number of the issue or PR.
     * @param {string[]} labels      An array of labels to remove.
     * @returns {Promise<object>} A promise that resolves to a success message.
     */
classData.description: Removes labels from an issue or pull request.

params.description: The number of the issue or PR.
params.name: issueNumber

returns.description: A promise that resolves to a success message.

classData.name: removeLabels

classData.comment:
/**
     * Manages relationships between GitHub issues including parent-child and blocked-by relationships.
     * This method allows setting or unsetting relationships between issues on GitHub.
     * @param {object}  options                                    The options object
     * @param {string}  [options.relationship_type='parent_child'] Type of relationship: 'parent_child' or 'blocked_by'
     * @param {number}  options.child_issue                        The issue number of the child/blocked issue
     * @param {number}  [options.parent_issue]                     The issue number of the parent/blocking issue (omit to unset relationship)
     * @param {boolean} [options.replace_parent=false]             If true, replaces existing parent relationship (parent_child only)
     * @returns {Promise<object>} Result with updated relationship information or error
     */
classData.description: Manages relationships between GitHub issues including parent-child and blocked-by relationships. This method allows setting or unsetting relationships between issues on GitHub.

params.description: The issue number of the child/blocked issue
params.name: options.child_issue

params.description: The issue number of the parent/blocking issue (omit to unset relationship)
params.name: options.parent_issue

params.description: If true, replaces existing parent relationship (parent_child only)
params.name: options.replace_parent

returns.description: Result with updated relationship information or error

classData.name: updateIssueRelationship
